abstract: French Defense Ministry says it is investigating claims of child sexual abuse by French soldiers in Central African Republic; acknowledgment comes after inquiry was leaked to newspaper The Guardian.
lead_paragraph: The Guardian published an article about disciplinary proceedings taken against a United Nations employee who leaked the allegations to the French authorities.

headline.main: French Army Investigates an Allegation of Sex Abuse in Central African Republic
headline.print_headline: French Army Investigates an Allegation of Sex Abuse

snippet: The Guardian published an article about disciplinary proceedings taken against a United Nations employee who leaked the allegations to the French authorities.

keywords.value: Bangui M'poko International Airport (Bangui, Central African Republic)
